alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Nobles (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 5:59AM CDT until April 23 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lyon County in northwestern Iowa... Western Osceola County in northwestern Iowa... West central Jackson County in southwestern Minnesota... Southeastern Nobles County in southwestern Minnesota... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 559 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sibley, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Rushmore around 615 AM CDT. Round Lake around 620 AM CDT. Worthington around 625 AM CDT. Brewster around 630 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bigelow. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
